participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and energetic, loves exploring the outdoors and trying new experiences.
participant_1.background: i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. i do not drink alcohol. my father was a construction worker. i hate the color pink. i am a huge coffee lover.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and driven, dedicated to her profession and passionate about her daughter's talents.
participant_2.background: i'm now looking for a new job. my daughter is a child prodigy. i am a doctor. my favorite movie is friday.

content.text: I have so much free time
